answers.answer: OMG yes! I'm 30 weeks with gestational diabetes...it's just getting harder and harder!!!!

I understand completely! I'll be 33 Weeks tomorrow and my little girl can't get here soon enough! Luckily for me, I get to go spend 2 Weeks with my family I haven't seen in months, which should help to pass some time!

question: I feel like I have hit a wall.  Like I have been pregnant forever. And the days are just creeping by. Ugh I got approximately 8 weeks left and it feels like an eternity away, but it really isn't. Ugh. Sorry ladies, just tired Lol any of you ladies feeling the same way!
title: 32 weeks
